menuItems.name: Avocado Sandwich
menuItems.description: Fresh avocado on artisan bread with a hint of lemon and a touch of arugula.

menuItems.name: Grilled Salmon
menuItems.description: Wild-caught salmon grilled to perfection, served with asparagus and a dill cream sauce.

menuItems.name: Ribeye Steak
menuItems.description: Prime ribeye steak, seasoned and grilled, accompanied by garlic mashed potatoes.

menuItems.name: Caesar Salad
menuItems.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with homemade Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

menuItems.name: Craft Beer
menuItems.description: Local craft beer selection to complement your meal.

menuItems.name: Cheeseburger
menuItems.description: Classic cheeseburger with a juicy patty, cheddar cheese, and all the fixings.

menuItems.name: Lobster Bisque
menuItems.description: A creamy and rich lobster bisque with a splash of cognac.

menuItems.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
menuItems.description: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

menuItems.name: Cedar Lemonade
menuItems.description: Refreshing lemonade infused with cedar, perfect for a hot day.

menuItems.name: Grilled Vegetable Platter
menuItems.description: An assortment of seasonal vegetables, grilled with a balsamic glaze.
